channel.title: Messenger on macchioni.in
channel.description: Recent content in Messenger on macchioni.in

item.title: Butterball Hotline - May 1st
item.description: L’evento con la “E” maiuscola: ICMC, l’Italian cycle messenger championship (Milano, 2-3-4 maggio). Gilfoyle, That’s what the fuck I do (Silicon Valley, S01E02) >While you were busy minoring in gender studies and singing a capella at Sarah Lawrence, I was gaining root access to NSA servers. I was one click away from starting a second Iranian Revolution. I prevent cross-site scripting, I monitor for DDoS attacks, emergency database rollbacks and faulty transaction handlers.
